Be6
Rh8

Yeah, we were all pretty invested in the game. We're all big fans of the LA Lakers, and they were playing the Boston Celtics, so it was a pretty intense matchup. We ordered a bunch of wings and beers, and I ended up eating way too many wings, but it was worth it. The energy in the bar was electric, and we were all high-fiving and cheering each other on. It was a great time.
